title: Leading causes of death among black U.S. residents in 2017
yAxis: Percentage of all causes of death
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Percentage of all causes of death in each Month on the y axis.
Month Diseases of the heart has the highest Percentage of all causes of death and Septicemia has the lowest Percentage of all causes of death.
The highest Month Diseases of the heart has 21.3 more Percentage of all causes of death than the lowest Month Septicemia.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Percentage of all causes of death in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of all causes of death 23.3 is found at Month Diseases of the heart and the minimum is found at Septicemia where Month is 2.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Percentage of all causes of death in each Month on the y axis.
Month Diseases of the heart has the highest Percentage of all causes of death and Septicemia has the lowest Percentage of all causes of death.
The highest Month Diseases of the heart has 21.3 more Percentage of all causes of death than the lowest Month Septicemia.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Percentage of all causes of death in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of all causes of death 23.3 is found at Month Diseases of the heart and the minimum is found at Septicemia where Month is 2.0.
Second maximum Percentage of all causes of death is found at Month Malignant neoplasms (cancers).
The minimum Month Septicemia has got 11.65 times less Percentage of all causes of death than the maximum Month Diseases of the heart.

Month Diseases of the heart is higher than any other Months with value 23.3, followed by Malignant neoplasms (cancers), and Accidents (unintentional injuries). Down to Month Septicemia with the lowest value 2.0.
The Percentage of all causes of death has reduced over the past 10 Months.
The Month Diseases of the heart has 3.15 times more Percentage of all causes of death than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 73.9.

data.Month: Nephritis nephrotic syndrome and nephrosis (kidney diseases)
